summary.price: Ranges from approximately ₹1.31 - ₹1.35 Crore in India.

car_models.corpus: The BMW X7 is a large, three-row luxury SUV designed to carry up to seven passengers in ultimate comfort. It is available with either a 3.0L diesel or petrol engine. Its standout key features include a panoramic sunroof for every row of seating, innovative gesture controls for the infotainment system, and a cavernous, high-end interior. Pricing in India ranges from approximately ₹1.31 to ₹1.35 Crore.

car_models.name: BMW Z4

summary.engine_and_performance: 3.0L twin-turbo 6-cylinder with 335 bhp.
summary.key_features: Two-seater roadster with a classic sports car design and a modern interior.
summary.price: Ranges from approximately ₹92.90 - ₹97.90 Lakh in India.

car_models.corpus: The BMW Z4 is a classic two-seater roadster that combines a traditional sports car design with a modern, luxurious interior. It is powered by a thrilling 3.0L twin-turbo 6-cylinder engine that produces 335 bhp. Its key features are its open-top driving experience, agile handling, and a sophisticated, driver-centric cockpit. In India, the BMW Z4 is priced between approximately ₹92.90 and ₹97.90 Lakh.

car_models.name: BMW i3

summary.engine_and_performance: Electric vehicle with a 42.2-kWh battery pack and a range of 153 miles.
summary.key_features: Compact electric car with futuristic styling and a contemporary interior.

car_models.corpus: The BMW i3 was a compact electric car known for its futuristic styling and innovative use of sustainable materials. It was equipped with a 42.2-kWh battery pack, providing a driving range of about 153 miles. Key features included its unique design, a contemporary and airy interior, and its construction from lightweight carbon fiber. A 2021 model of the BMW i3 had a starting price of $45,445.

car_models.name: BMW i8

summary.engine_and_performance: Plug-in hybrid with a 1.5L 3-cylinder engine and an electric motor.
summary.key_features: Futuristic sports car with gullwing doors and a lightweight carbon-fiber construction.
summary.price: Production has ended, but used models are available.

car_models.corpus: The BMW i8 was a futuristic plug-in hybrid sports car that made a bold statement with its design and technology. It combined a 1.5L 3-cylinder engine with an electric motor for impressive performance and efficiency. Its most iconic key features were its dramatic gullwing doors and its advanced, lightweight carbon-fiber construction. Production has since ended, but used models are available on the market.

car_models.name: Buick Cascada

summary.engine_and_performance: 1.6L turbocharged 4-cylinder with 200 hp.
summary.key_features: Four-seat convertible with a soft top and a comfortable ride.

car_models.corpus: The Buick Cascada is a four-seat convertible that offers a comfortable and relaxed open-top driving experience. It is powered by a 1.6L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine with 200 horsepower. Key features include its power-operated soft top and a ride quality that is tuned for comfort over sporty handling. The 2019 model of the Buick Cascada started at a price of $33,995.

car_models.name: Buick Enclave

summary.engine_and_performance: 3.6L V6 engine.
summary.key_features: Three-row SUV with a spacious and quiet interior, featuring a 30-inch diagonal premium display.

car_models.corpus: The Buick Enclave is a three-row SUV known for its spacious, quiet interior and premium features. It is powered by a 3.6L V6 engine. A standout key feature for the 2026 model is a massive 30-inch diagonal premium display that spans the dashboard, creating a very modern and high-tech cabin environment. Pricing for the 2026 Buick Enclave starts at $46,200.

car_models.name: Buick Encore

summary.engine_and_performance: 1.4L turbocharged 4-cylinder with 155 hp.
summary.key_features: Subcompact SUV with a surprisingly spacious cabin and an intuitive infotainment system.

car_models.corpus: The Buick Encore is a subcompact SUV that offers a surprisingly spacious cabin for its small size. It is equipped with a 1.4L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine that produces 155 horsepower. Its key features are its roomy interior and an intuitive, easy-to-use infotainment system, making it a practical choice for city driving. The 2022 model of the Buick Encore had a starting price of $26,415.

car_models.name: Buick Envision

summary.engine_and_performance: 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine.
summary.key_features: Compact SUV with a stylish design and a premium interior.

car_models.corpus: The Buick Envision is a compact SUV that features a stylish design and a premium-feeling interior. Under the hood is a 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine. Its key features are its sharp exterior styling and a cabin that offers a near-luxury level of comfort and materials. For the 2025 model year, the Buick Envision is priced starting at $36,500.

car_models.name: Buick Lacrosse

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a 2.5L 4-cylinder or a 3.6L V6 engine.
summary.key_features: Refined interior, QuietTuning technology, and an 8-inch touchscreen.
summary.price: Last recorded price was around PKR 70.0 lacs in Pakistan.

car_models.corpus: The Buick Lacrosse is a full-size luxury sedan that was designed to provide a refined and quiet ride. It was available with either a 2.5L 4-cylinder or a 3.6L V6 engine. Key features included a sophisticated interior, Buick's QuietTuning technology to minimize road noise, and an 8-inch touchscreen infotainment system. The last recorded price in Pakistan was around PKR 70.0 lacs.

car_models.name: Buick Regal

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a 2.4L 4-cylinder or a 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine.
summary.key_features: Sporty and athletic feel, featuring an 8.0-inch touchscreen infotainment system.
summary.price: Last recorded prices for a 2017 model were between $27,990–$37,960.

car_models.corpus: The Buick Regal was a mid-size sedan with a sporty and athletic feel, particularly in its Sportback and GS versions. It was offered with a 2.4L 4-cylinder or a more powerful 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine. Key features included its dynamic handling and an 8.0-inch touchscreen infotainment system. The last recorded prices for a 2017 model were between $27,990 and $37,960.

car_models.name: Cadillac ATS

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a 3.6L V6 engine with 335 hp.
summary.key_features: Performance-oriented features like Magnetic Ride Control.
summary.price: Contact dealer for used car pricing.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac ATS was a compact luxury sedan designed to compete with its German rivals, emphasizing performance. It was available with a potent 3.6L V6 engine delivering 335 horsepower. Key features included performance-oriented options like Magnetic Ride Control, an adaptive suspension system that adjusts damping in real-time for improved handling. Pricing is available from dealers for used models.

car_models.name: Cadillac CT4

summary.engine_and_performance: 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine with 237 hp.
summary.key_features: An 8-inch HD color information display and available driver awareness packages.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac CT4 is a compact luxury sedan that serves as an entry point to the Cadillac brand. It is powered by a 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine producing 237 horsepower. Key features include an 8-inch HD color information display and the availability of driver awareness packages for enhanced safety. The 2025 Cadillac CT4 has a starting price of $36,490.

car_models.name: Cadillac CT5

summary.engine_and_performance: Standard 2.0L twin-scroll turbocharged engine or an optional 3.0L twin-turbo V6 with 335 hp.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac CT5 is a mid-size luxury sedan featuring bold styling and advanced technology. It comes standard with a 2.0L twin-scroll turbocharged engine, with an optional 3.0L twin-turbo V6 available that produces 335 horsepower. Its standout key features are a massive 33-inch diagonal advanced LED touchscreen display and the available Super Cruise hands-free driving technology. The 2026 model will start at $48,600.

car_models.name: Cadillac CT6

summary.engine_and_performance: 3.6L V6 engine with 335 hp.
summary.key_features: A spacious interior and a range of premium features.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac CT6 was a full-size luxury sedan that offered a spacious interior and a host of premium features. It was powered by a 3.6L V6 engine with 335 horsepower. The key features of the CT6 were its generous passenger space and a long list of luxury and technology appointments designed to provide a comfortable and high-end experience. A 2020 model had a starting price of $58,995.

car_models.name: Cadillac CTS

summary.engine_and_performance: 3.2L petrol engine.
summary.key_features: A focus on performance and a comfortable ride.
summary.price: Last recorded price was around ₹45 Lakh in India.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac CTS was a mid-size luxury sedan that played a significant role in redefining the Cadillac brand with a focus on performance. It was offered in India with a 3.2L petrol engine. Its key features were a comfortable ride and handling characteristics that balanced luxury with sportiness. The last recorded price in India was approximately ₹45 Lakh.

car_models.name: Cadillac Escalade

summary.engine_and_performance: Powerful V8 engine.
summary.key_features: A commanding presence, a luxurious interior, and advanced technology.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac Escalade is a full-size luxury SUV renowned for its commanding presence on the road. It is powered by a powerful V8 engine. Its key features are its iconic and imposing design, an incredibly luxurious and technology-rich interior, and its status as a symbol of success. Pricing for the Escalade is provided by dealers.

car_models.name: Cadillac XT4

summary.engine_and_performance: 2.0L turbocharged engine with 235 hp.
summary.key_features: A 33-inch diagonal advanced color LED display and available all-wheel drive.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac XT4 is a compact luxury SUV featuring a 2.0L turbocharged engine that produces 235 horsepower. Key features for the 2025 model include a stunning 33-inch diagonal advanced color LED display that curves toward the driver and the availability of all-wheel drive for enhanced traction. The starting price for the 2025 Cadillac XT4 is $40,795.

car_models.name: Cadillac XT5

summary.engine_and_performance: Standard 2.0L turbo 4-cylinder engine, with a 3.6L V6 available.
summary.key_features: A range of trim levels, offering features like a Bose premium sound system and wireless phone charging.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac XT5 is a mid-size luxury SUV available in a range of trim levels to suit different tastes. The standard engine is a 2.0L turbo 4-cylinder, with a 3.6L V6 also available. Key features offered across its trims include a Bose premium sound system and convenient wireless phone charging. The 2025 Cadillac XT5 starts at a price of $45,690.

car_models.name: Cadillac XT6

summary.engine_and_performance: Standard 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder or an available 3.6L V6 engine.
summary.key_features: Seating for up to seven passengers and a Cadillac User Experience (CUE) infotainment system.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac XT6 is a three-row luxury SUV designed for families, offering seating for up to seven passengers. It comes with a standard 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine, with a 3.6L V6 engine available as an option. Key features include its three-row seating configuration and the intuitive Cadillac User Experience (CUE) infotainment system. Pricing for the 2025 model starts at $49,195.

car_models.name: Cadillac XTS

summary.engine_and_performance: 3.6L V6 engine with 304 hp.
summary.key_features: A comfortable and spacious interior.

car_models.corpus: The Cadillac XTS was a full-size luxury sedan that focused on providing a comfortable and spacious interior. It was equipped with a 3.6L V6 engine that produced 304 horsepower. Its primary key features were its plush ride quality and a roomy cabin, appealing to buyers who prioritized comfort. The 2019 model of the Cadillac XTS started at $46,895.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Blazer

summary.engine_and_performance: Standard 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine or an available 3.6L V6.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Blazer is a mid-size SUV with a bold, sporty design inspired by the Camaro muscle car. It comes with a standard 2.0L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine, with a 3.6L V6 also available. Its key features include its aggressive styling, the option of all-wheel drive, and the standard inclusion of the Chevy Safety Assist package. The 2025 Chevrolet Blazer starts at $35,600.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Bolt EV

summary.engine_and_performance: All-electric vehicle with a range of up to 259 miles.
summary.key_features: A spacious interior and one-pedal driving capability.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Bolt EV is a compact all-electric car that offers a generous driving range of up to 259 miles on a full charge. Key features include a surprisingly spacious interior for its size and the convenient one-pedal driving capability, which enhances regenerative braking. The 2023 Chevrolet Bolt EV had a starting price of $27,495.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Camaro

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a range of engines, from a 2.0L turbo to a 6.2L supercharged V8 in the ZL1 model.
summary.key_features: A bold design and a range of performance packages.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Camaro is an iconic muscle car with a bold design and a strong performance heritage. It is available with a wide range of engines, from an efficient 2.0L turbo to a monstrous 6.2L supercharged V8 in the top-tier ZL1 model. Its key features are its aggressive styling and the availability of various performance packages to suit different levels of enthusiasm. The 2024 model starts at $32,495.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Colorado

summary.key_features: An 11.3-inch diagonal center touchscreen and available off-road packages.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Colorado is a capable mid-size pickup truck powered by a 2.7L TurboMax engine that delivers 310 horsepower and 430 lb-ft of torque. Key features include a standard 11.3-inch diagonal center touchscreen for infotainment and the availability of various off-road packages, like the ZR2, for enhanced capability. Pricing for the 2025 Chevrolet Colorado begins at $31,900.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Corvette

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a range of high-performance engines, including a naturally aspirated 5.5L V8 in the Z06 model.
summary.key_features: A focus on performance and a driver-centric cockpit.
summary.price: Starting at $68,300 for the Stingray model.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Corvette is a mid-engine sports car that offers supercar-level performance at a more accessible price point. It is available with a range of high-performance engines, including a naturally aspirated 5.5L V8 in the Z06 model. Its key features are its incredible performance capabilities, a driver-centric cockpit, and its dramatic mid-engine proportions. The base Stingray model starts at $68,300.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Cruze

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Cruze was a compact sedan that was offered in India with a 2.0L diesel engine producing 164 bhp. car_models.name: Chevrolet Equinox

summary.key_features: An 11.3-inch diagonal infotainment touchscreen and standard Chevy Safety Assist.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Equinox is a compact SUV powered by a 1.5L turbo engine. For the 2025 model year, its key features include a large 11.3-inch diagonal infotainment touchscreen and the standard inclusion of the Chevy Safety Assist suite of safety features. The 2025 Chevrolet Equinox has a starting price of $28,600.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Impala

summary.engine_and_performance: Historically offered with a range of V6 and V8 engines.
summary.key_features: A spacious interior and a comfortable ride.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Impala was a full-size sedan known for its spacious interior and comfortable ride. Historically, it was offered with a range of V6 and V8 engines. Its defining key features were its roomy cabin, which could comfortably seat five adults, and a smooth, compliant ride quality ideal for long trips. Production of the Impala has ended, but used models remain available.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Malibu

summary.engine_and_performance: 1.5L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine.
summary.key_features: A comfortable interior and standard Chevy Safety Assist.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Malibu is a mid-size sedan that features a comfortable interior and a 1.5L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine. A key feature of the Malibu is the standard inclusion of Chevy Safety Assist, a package of six advanced safety and driver assistance technologies. The 2024 Chevrolet Malibu starts at a price of $25,100.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Silverado 1500

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Silverado 1500 is a full-size pickup truck available with a wide range of engines, including a powerful V8. Key features include a highly durable truck bed, a vast array of trim levels from basic work truck to full luxury, and advanced trailering technology to make towing easier and safer. The 2024 Work Truck model starts at $36,800.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a 6.6L V8 gas or diesel engine.
summary.key_features: A high towing capacity and a range of work-oriented features.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD is a heavy-duty pickup truck designed for serious work and towing. Key features include its very high towing and payload capacities and a range of work-oriented features designed for durability and utility. The 2025 model starts at $48,800.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Sonic

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Sonic is a subcompact car powered by a 1.4L engine that produces 138 horsepower. Available key features that add comfort and convenience include heated seats and a touchscreen infotainment system, which were notable for the segment. The 2025 model of the Chevrolet Sonic is priced starting at $16,295.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Spark

summary.engine_and_performance: 1.0L petrol engine with 62.1 bhp.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Spark was a compact hatchback designed with a focus on fuel efficiency and easy maneuverability for city driving. In India, it was equipped with a 1.0L petrol engine that produced 62.1 bhp. Its key attributes were its small size, low running costs, and practicality in urban environments. The last recorded price in India was in the range of ₹3.34 to ₹4.22 Lakh.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Suburban

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Suburban is a large SUV that offers an enormous interior and best-in-class cargo volume. Engine options include a 5.3L or 6.2L V8, or a 3.0L turbo-diesel. For 2025, key features include a massive 17.7-inch diagonal center touchscreen and its cavernous space for passengers and cargo. The 2025 Suburban starts at $62,000.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Tahoe

summary.key_features: A refreshed interior and a spacious design.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Tahoe is a full-size SUV that shares its platform and engine options with the larger Suburban. For the latest model year, the Tahoe receives a refreshed interior and a spacious design, making it a comfortable and capable family hauler. Pricing information for the newest models can be obtained from a Chevrolet dealer.

car_models.name: Chevrolet TrailBlazer

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Trailblazer is a small SUV available with either a 1.2L or 1.3L turbo engine. Key features include a standard 11-inch diagonal HD color touchscreen and the availability of all-wheel drive for improved traction in various conditions. The 2026 model of the Chevrolet Trailblazer is expected to start at $23,000.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Traverse

summary.engine_and_performance: 3.6L V6 engine with 310 hp.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Traverse is a three-row SUV capable of seating 7-8 passengers, making it a strong choice for large families. It is powered by a 3.6L V6 engine that produces 310 horsepower. Its key features are its generous passenger capacity and a spacious cargo area, even with the third row in use. The 2025 Traverse starts at $31,125.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Trax

summary.engine_and_performance: 1.2L turbocharged engine.
summary.key_features: An 11-inch color touchscreen and standard Chevy Safety Assist.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Trax is a compact SUV powered by a 1.2L turbocharged engine. Its key features include a large 11-inch color touchscreen and the standard inclusion of the Chevy Safety Assist package, offering significant value in its segment. The 2025 Chevrolet Trax is attractively priced, starting at $20,400.

car_models.name: Chevrolet Volt

summary.engine_and_performance: Plug-in hybrid with an all-electric range of up to 53 miles.
summary.key_features: Combines electric driving with a gasoline generator for extended range.
summary.price: Production ended in 2019, but used models are available.

car_models.corpus: The Chevrolet Volt was a pioneering plug-in hybrid compact car that combined all-electric driving with a gasoline generator for extended range. It offered an all-electric range of up to 53 miles before the gasoline engine would activate. This extended-range capability was its key feature. Production ended in 2019, but used models are available.

car_models.name: Chrysler 300

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a 3.6L V6 or a powerful Hemi V8 engine.

car_models.corpus: The Chrysler 300 is a full-size sedan known for its classic American design and comfortable ride. It is available with a 3.6L V6 engine or a powerful Hemi V8 engine for those seeking more performance. Its key features are its bold, retro-inspired styling and its focus on providing a smooth, quiet, and comfortable journey. The 2023 model started at $37,740.

car_models.name: Chrysler Pacifica

summary.engine_and_performance: 3.6L V6 engine.
summary.key_features: A versatile interior, Stow 'n Go seating, and a range of family-friendly features.

car_models.corpus: The Chrysler Pacifica is a versatile minivan powered by a 3.6L V6 engine. It is packed with family-friendly key features, most notably the innovative Stow 'n Go seating system that allows the second-row seats to fold completely into the floor, creating a flat load surface. The 2025 Chrysler Pacifica starts at a price of $42,450.

car_models.name: Dodge Challenger

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a range of engines, from a V6 to a supercharged Hemi V8.
summary.key_features: A retro design and a focus on performance.

car_models.corpus: The Dodge Challenger is a classic muscle car with a retro design that harks back to its 1970s ancestor. It is available with a wide range of engines, from a standard V6 to a monstrous supercharged Hemi V8 in models like the Hellcat. Its key features are its iconic styling and its relentless focus on straight-line performance. A 2023 model had a starting price of $34,395.

car_models.name: Dodge Charger

summary.key_features: A spacious interior and available all-wheel drive.

car_models.corpus: The Dodge Charger is a unique four-door muscle car that combines the performance of the Challenger with the practicality of a sedan. It shares similar engine options with the Challenger, including powerful V8s. Key features include its spacious interior for a performance car and the availability of all-wheel drive, a rarity in its class. The 2021 model started at $32,720.

car_models.name: Dodge Durango

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a V6 or a range of V8 engines, including the high-performance SRT Hellcat.
summary.key_features: A muscular design and a focus on performance.

car_models.corpus: The Dodge Durango is a three-row SUV with a muscular design and a focus on performance. It is available with a standard V6 or a range of powerful V8 engines, including the high-performance SRT Hellcat model. Its key features are its aggressive, muscle-car-inspired styling and its impressive towing and performance capabilities for an SUV. The 2025 model starts at $38,495.

car_models.name: Dodge Grand Caravan

Its key feature was the convenient Stow 'n Go seating system, which made it incredibly easy to switch between carrying passengers and cargo. A 2020 model had a starting price of $27,530.

car_models.name: Dodge Journey

summary.engine_and_performance: Available with a 4-cylinder or a V6 engine.

Its main key feature was its optional third row of seats, which provided extra versatility for larger families. Production of the Journey has ended, but used models can be found.

car_models.name: Ferrari 488 GTB

It is powered by a 3.9L twin-turbo V8 engine that produces 661 horsepower. Its key features include its aerodynamically sculpted body and a driver-focused cockpit designed for ultimate control at high speeds. A 2019 model had a starting price of $266,397.

car_models.name: Ferrari GTC4Lusso

car_models.corpus: The Ferrari GTC4Lusso is a unique four-seat grand tourer that combines supercar performance with practicality. It is powered by a 6.3L V12 engine with 680 horsepower. Its defining key features are its innovative all-wheel-drive system and a luxurious interior with seating for four, making it a highly versatile Ferrari. The 2020 model started at $303,750.

car_models.name: Ferrari Portofino

Its key features include a retractable hardtop that transforms it from a coupe to a spider in seconds, and a luxurious, comfortable interior suitable for touring. In India, the Ferrari Portofino starts at a price of ₹3.50 Crore.

car_models.name: FIAT 124 Spider
